title: Resume

content:
Hi, I’m Kevin! #I’m a full stack software developer with extensive experience designing accounting solutions for local governments and utilities. I have over six years of professional development experience and a lifelong love for tinkering and learning about tech. Passionate about writing testable, quality code and building scalable web apps.
Hobbies and Interests #Outside of my work life, I enjoy exploring Michigan’s Upper Peninsula and cooking delicious healthy food for my family. I’m an avid mountain biker and skier and love to experience what every season has to offer. I also love a great cup of coffeeâ˜•.
